name.baseName: 直接还原铁生产;直接还原铁;基于天然气直接还原（ENE）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) production based on natural gas, specified as the Energy Efficient (ENE) process, is utilized in the manufacturing of steel as an alternative to the traditional blast furnace method. This process is used for producing iron that is often later converted into steel, which can be employed across various industries including construction, automotive, and appliance manufacturing.
基于天然气的直接还原铁（DRI）生产，特指能效型（ENE）工艺，用于作为传统高炉方法的替代，在钢铁制造中使用。该过程用于生产通常后续转化为钢铁的铁，可用于建筑、汽车和家电制造等各种产业。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The average operating data of Coal-DR, NG-DR (MID), and NG-DR (ENE) demonstration projects in China are used as the benchmark for the LCI of DR routes.

technology.technologicalApplicability: Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) production based on natural gas, specified as the Energy Efficient (ENE) process, is utilized in the manufacturing of steel as an alternative to the traditional blast furnace method. This process is used for producing iron that is often later converted into steel, which can be employed across various industries including construction, automotive, and appliance manufacturing.
基于天然气的直接还原铁（DRI）生产，特指能效型（ENE）工艺，用于作为传统高炉方法的替代，在钢铁制造中使用。该过程用于生产通常后续转化为钢铁的铁，可用于建筑、汽车和家电制造等各种产业。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: LCI of COG-DR and H-DR routes, which is not scaled-up in China are estimated based on Coal-DR routes combined with literature data from simulations, laboratory tests, and process modeling in Table 9 [49,50]. The LCI of Coal-DR is obtai

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China
The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing the life cycle inventory (LCI) data of the DRI production processes, namely Coal-Based DR (Coal-DR), Natural Gas-Based DR (NG-DR) with mid-range efficiency (MID), and the energy-efficient (ENE) variation, users should refer to the operating data from Chinese demonstration projects as a benchmark. For the routes not extensively scaled in China, such as COG-DR and H-DR, the LCI should be extrapolated using the Coal-DR data in conjunction with simulation, laboratory test, and process modeling literature. Note that methodological considerations like system boundaries, data quality, and technological applicability need to be taken into account.
在使用直接还原铁生产过程的生命周期清单（LCI）数据时，包括基于煤的DR（Coal-DR）、具有中等效率的天然气基DR（NG-DR）（MID）以及高效能（ENE）变体，用户应参考中国示范项目的运营数据作为基准。对于在中国尚未大规模铺开的路线，如COG-DR和H-DR，LCI应结合仿真、实验室测试和流程建模文献使用Coal-DR数据推算。注意，需要考虑方法论考虑，如系统边界、数据质量和技术适用性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The average operating data of Coal-DR, NG-DR (MID), and NG-DR (ENE) demonstration projects in China are used as the benchmark for the LCI of DR routes.
